title: How Many Calories Are in Half and Half?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in half and half per tablespoon, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and serving tips for coffee or recipes.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Half and Half?
assumptions: Standard half-and-half (equal parts milk and cream, ~10-18% fat); 1 tablespoon = 15 ml or ~15 g; no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, fat content, and processing; check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One tablespoon of half-and-half contains about 20 calories and 0.4 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add to coffee with sugar (1 tsp per tbsp)

faqs.q: How many calories is in half and half per serving?
Is half and half high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 1.7 g total fat per tablespoon, mostly saturated (1.1 g).

faqs.q: How does half and half compare to heavy cream calories?
faqs.a: Half-and-half has fewer calories (~20 kcal/tbsp) than heavy cream (~50 kcal/tbsp).

faqs.q: What's the carb count in half and half?
faqs.a: Low at 0.6 g carbs per tablespoon, all from natural sugars.

faqs.q: Can I use half and half in recipes without many calories?
faqs.a: Yes, but opt for low-fat versions to keep calories under 15 kcal per tablespoon.
